articles.title: Chris Hemsworth on Playing the Villain of Spiderhead - IGN
articles.description: Star Chris Hemsworth talks about portraying the big bad in the sci-fi thriller, while director Joseph Kosinski and producer Eric Newman weigh in on the film's use of yacht rock music. Spiderhead debuts on Netflix on June 17.
